div.dateline:
Légation de Libéria
A HAÏTI
London, August 22d 1890.
div.p:
I am since several days in London. I will leave to morrow for Leamington Warwickshire
Royal Leamington Spa, üblicherweise Leamington Spa oder Leamington abgekürzt, ist ein Kurort im Zentrum der Grafschaft Warwickshire in England. to spend one day with my old friend Major R. Stuart
Major Robert Stuart (c. 1812-1901), von Hause aus Berufsoffizier, amtierte (1874ff.) als Generalkonsul in Haiti sowie Chargé d’Affaires für die Dominikanische Republik. who was commander of the Bristish cavalry & was 9 year minister resident in Hayti – From there I will go and spend two days in Liverpool with my son & his five Children. I will be back in London Monday night – Wednesday night I will be in Ostend, Thursday at Bruxelles, and the 31st at Spa – On the 6 in Paris, 8 at Geneva, 9 at Berne, 12 at Paris. On the 14th I will leave to visit – le Midi de la France – On the 20 I will be back to Paris, on the 25 I will be back to Paris, on the 25 I will leave for New-York via Havre of Bordeaux – I will spend fifteen
days through America, Original: throught america. will embarked (sic) at Tempa for Key West & Havanna and on the 20 of October I will be in Hayti – if God says so. My daughter Rose was married 5 years ago – she is a widow, with two children two years now – Corine was also married & in February she became a widower [sic] after 14 months of marriage – but withgem. „without“? any child – so you see. I have been very unfortunate - & my poor children also.
It is very unfortunate that we cannot shake hand together before I leave for Haïti – but we will be perhaps more fortunate in 92 – as I intend to visit Germany, Austria & Russia.

closer.salute: With my best regards to your family, I remain, dear & good friend very truly yours
